description: Edits the current clipboard text in a simple editor so pasted content reflects the changes. Shortcuts: Ctrl+Alt+C opens the editor, Ctrl+Shift+Z restores the previous clipboard.
changelog:
- Initial release.
- Clipboard editor dialog with Read, Information, Find/Replace, Clear, Save, and Cancel.
- Global shortcuts for opening the editor, reading clipboard, and showing information.
- Clipboard backup (protect mode) with restore.
- Configurable button visibility and shortcut behavior in settings.

translations.description: Edits the current clipboard text in a simple editor so pasted content reflects the changes. Shortcuts: Ctrl+Alt+C opens the editor, Ctrl+Shift+Z restores the previous clipboard.

- Initial release.
- Clipboard editor dialog with Read, Information, Find/Replace, Clear, Save, and Cancel.
- Global shortcuts for opening the editor, reading clipboard, and showing information.

translations.description: Mengedit teks clipboard saat ini melalui editor sederhana agar hasil tempel sesuai perubahan. Shortcut: Ctrl+Alt+C untuk membuka editor, Ctrl+Shift+Z untuk memulihkan clipboard sebelumnya.
translations.changelog:
- Rilis awal.
- Dialog editor clipboard dengan Read, Information, Find/Replace, Clear, Save, dan Cancel.
- Shortcut global untuk membuka editor, membaca clipboard, dan menampilkan informasi.
- Cadangan clipboard (protect mode) dengan pemulihan.
- Pengaturan visibilitas tombol dan perilaku shortcut di settings.
